name: Valletta Suites

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at Maison La Vallette, one of the Valletta Suites, in October 2011 for 5 nights.
reviews.title: Nothing short of perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service is friendly and personal, and Stephen went out of his way to make sure that our stay was perfect, and exactly what you imagine a holiday to be.
reviews.title: very charming and well equipped apartment in valetta's historical city

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: When you step into the room, you can't help but feel relaxed. Old sandstone walls tell stories of yesteryear, accentuated with original and unique pieces of furniture, works of art and photography. Divine fabrics, interesting books and antique pieces complete the room, and I only wish I could bring it back home to Australia.
reviews.title: Valletta Nobile - Nice little Gem in Malta

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In an ideal location - close to the water, restaurants, cafes and shops - I can not recommend Maison La Vallette highly enough.
reviews.title: Wow, Lucia Nova is an amazing styled apartment. A gem of Valletta

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled solo
reviews.text: My review is a little late...so apologies to Brian and Stephen.
reviews.title: Lucia Nova - 2nd time.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: This past May was the 2nd time I stayed at Lucia Nova and the 4th time I rented from Valletta Suites. Lucia Nova is my idea of heaven. I love the spaciousness of Lucia Nova. Traveling by myself, I felt like a local living in Valletta.
reviews.title: Wonderful Trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In my many travels to Malta, I have finally found the perfect solution to housing...that is, staying at one of Valletta Suites' properties. I love the individual attention that Brian and Stephen provide. In addition, each of their properties are luxuriously decorated and comfy. Having a kitchen is a good way to save money. I would have breakfast in-house and then find a great restaurant to have a late lunch. It was great to have a refrigerator to store drinks, yogurt and leftovers.
reviews.title: Terrific Apartment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank you once again Brian and Stephen for a wonderful trip!
reviews.title: Lucia Nova, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just returned from a five night stay at Lucia Nova. The apartment really helped to make our trip wonderful! Very unique place! We felt like we were living in a part of history. My daughers loved having their own level and were thrilled with the bathroom--especially after coming from a tiny bathroom in Paris! Brian was very helpful and responsive to our questions and a couple of requests we had while we were there. A couple of the reviews have noted that the Vanguard Club across the street can get a bit noisy. We, in fact, loved having the "club" across the street. The same group of men sit outside morning until night. They were friendly and helpful, inquiring about how our day was and what our plans were for the next--often making recommendations as to things we should see and do. We also got to know the owners of the bakery just up the road. Again, wonderful people who added to our experience. We had a wonderful time and would return to Lucia Nova in a minute. Enjoy all!
reviews.title: Live like a Maltan with some pizzazz!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: I just returned from my 9-night stay in Lucia Nova.
reviews.title: Lucia Nova

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed in the other 2 properties of Valletta Suites, but Lucia Nova has got to be my favorite. (I sure hope Heaven looks likes Lucia Nova.)
reviews.title: Valletta Nobile - perfect base to explore Malta!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The best part of staying here is the incredible amount of space. As you enter the building, you will go up a flight of stairs and be in the sitting room, dining area and a compact and efficient kitchen. I did not cook any meals but it was nice to warm up pastry in the microwave and store cold drinks and yogurt in the refrigerator. An electric kettle is provided...because sometimes you just want a nice hot cup of tea.
reviews.title: A fantastic stay in Valletta

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Go up one more flight of stairs, and you enter a beautiful bedroom. The walls have layers of paint from previous inhabitants to the house that show the beauty of time past. The colors are a soft blue, green and cream. Think of Monet's painting "Water Lilies" and you can imagine the Impressionistic coloring of the walls. There is a lovely Maltese balcony here that lets the sunlight stream into the room in the morning. But if you choose not to have sunlight come into the room in the morning, you can close the door to the balcony for less light. One day I slept late and was in bed with the sun streaming in and wondering why I should even get out this most comfortable bed, but then I figured I should at least do something that day.
reviews.title: Valletta Nobile

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bathroom has a rainfall shower. In the morning and after a day of sightseeing, it was nice to step under the rainfall shower and have the very relaxing water wash over me. The toilet and sink are of a very high quality to match the bathroom.
reviews.title: Maison la vallette - a unique and wonderful place to stay in Valletta

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent several nights at the Lucia Nova suite in St
reviews.title: Suitable for 1 couple, pleasant stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lucia street. It is. Comfortable for 2 people only as is quite small even though over 4 levels. (The 3rd being the second bedroom). The location is excellent and noise only from the bar across the road on certain days. There is a baker, small food store around the corner, and several restaurants within walking distance. The negative is the bathroom, no shelving for toiletry bags, no shower curtain/screen so the water goes all over the bathroom floor. No toiletries are supplied and we asked for the towels/linen to be changed after the 4th day. There are no laundry facilities at all, not even a clothes horse to put on the terrace. If there are 4 people it would also be better to have the tv in the lounge rather than bedrooms. the lounge only has room for 2 to sit comfortably. The owner was very accommodating and friendly. With some improvements this place could be better bud recommendable nonetheless.
reviews.title: Lucia Nova in Valletta

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Makes you feel like you've been living in Valletta all of your life. Amazing historic 400 year old house with all of today's 4* luxuries - the walls in the 2nd floor bedroom are out of this world. Overall great deal for the buck. Brian and Steven will not only make you feel like you are at home, but provide a detailed overview of all on-going cultural events and/ or give you a detailed background on anything historic in regards to beautiful Malta. Their idea of sustainable tourism, involving renovation and preservation of the historic Valletta and allowing 'us' a first hand experience in it, is priceless - go Valletta Suites!!!
reviews.title: Valetta Suite

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and I have just spent 8 nights at Valetta suites and I must say the service, flat 'Maison La Vallette' and location were excellent. For two of us the space was perfect and the pick up service from the airport and attention to detail was first class.
reviews.title: Lavish luxury @ Lucia Nova!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The flat is well located and only a minutes walk from the waters edge and the cafes and restaurants of Valetta.
reviews.title: Fantastic Place to stay in Valletta

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: As an American, I have been traveling to Malta for several years. I would normally stay in a hotel in either Sliema or St. Julians. The accommodations were adequate but something would be missing.
reviews.title: The best choice for your stay in Malta.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: And then I found the properties of Valletta Suites. I first stayed in Maison La Vallette, and then Valletta Nobile and I will be staying in Lucia Nova in May 2012. At his point, I would only stay at the properties that belong to Stephen and Brian of Valletta Suites.
reviews.title: Maison La Vallette - loved it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Why? Exceptional service, incredible attention to detail, and an extremely high level of quality furnishings that are only found in the most expensive hotels.
reviews.title: Lucia Nova with Love

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Exceptional service: You will notice this when you correspond with Valletta Suites. All e-mails are answered promptly and fully. But it doesn't stop there. From the time you arrive until the time you depart, Stephen and Brian will check to make sure everything is OK and going well. Last year after some major flight delays and re-routing, one of my suitcases were delayed for a couple of days. Stephen and Brian kept on top of things tracking it down and then delivering it to me.
reviews.title: "Beautiful and tasteful apartment"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Incredible attention to detail: All items in the properties of Valletta Suites are selected with the utmost care. Each photo, painting, piece of furniture, etc., are placed just so with care and love and an incredible eye for design.
reviews.title: great place!!

description: The philosophy behind Valletta Suites is to bring together small unique living spaces within the walled city of Valletta.
